name: NoLimits Track Element File
summary: Learn about .NLELEM files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Roller coaster tracks can be constructed using the NoLimits Editor, which is included with NoLimits.

description: File used by NoLimits, a roller coaster simulation game; stores the model structure and associated data for a roller coaster track segment, such as a loop, roll, or spiral; used for constructing NoLimits tracks (.NLTRACK files).
